name: Heatwavy
description:
Made over 2 week  for the June/July Jackpot Game Jam.

Can you defeat all the bosses and restore the temperature balance to the world? 

You are HEATWAVY, a small fire elemental that must free the cooling crystals once a year in order to protect his world.  With his fire shooting abilities, fight off waves of enemies that are attracted by the crystal's power. 

Made in Unity game engine.

Sprite art done in Photoshop CC.

Sound made in sfxr sound generator.

Music made in Google Music Lab

After playing please do this Google Forms Survey! (Really helps me improve and know what players like/don't like. Here: https://forms.gle/fwRQDJBDTAMsJ96d9

*Comments and suggestions/opinions/tips greatly appreciated!
